doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

description.text: Draw a helical wheel diagram for a protein sequence

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.label: Plot the wheel Yes No

Number of steps (value from 2 to 100)?
The number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value.

Number of turns (value from 1 to 100)?
The number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value.
Choose the e_graph output format Png Gif Cps Ps Meta Data
Name of the output graph

Prompt for amphipathic residue marking?
Yes No
If this is true then the residues ACFGILMVWY are marked as squares and all other residues are unmarked. This overrides any other markup that you may have specified using the qualifiers '-squares', '-diamonds' and '-octags'.

Mark as squares?
By default the aliphatic residues ILVM are marked with squares.

Mark as diamonds?
By default the residues DENQST are marked with diamonds.

Mark as octagons?
By default the positively charged residues HKR are marked with octagons.

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: The number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value.
The number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value.

If this is true then the residues ACFGILMVWY are marked as squares and all other residues are unmarked. This overrides any other markup that you may have specified using the qualifiers '-squares', '-diamonds' and '-octags'.
By default the aliphatic residues ILVM are marked with squares.
By default the residues DENQST are marked with diamonds.
By default the positively charged residues HKR are marked with octagons.

div.title: This parameter is mandatory
div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

format.code: ("", " -steps=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 2 is required
Value less than or equal to 100 is required

comment.text: The number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value.

interface.label:
Number of steps (value from 2 to 100)?
The number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value.

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: The number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value.

format.code: ("", " -turns=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 1 is required
Value less than or equal to 100 is required

comment.text: The number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value.

interface.label:
Number of turns (value from 1 to 100)?
The number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value.

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: The number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value.

format.code: (" -graph=" + str(vdef), " -graph=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

interface.label: Choose the e_graph output format Png Gif Cps Ps Meta Data

comment.text: If this is true then the residues ACFGILMVWY are marked as squares and all other residues are unmarked. This overrides any other markup that you may have specified using the qualifiers '-squares', '-diamonds' and '-octags'.
